name: Diarrhea Another Day
description:
Stealth game developed in 48h for the FamiliarGameJam8

Agent James Beans has seen his mission compromised by an unexpected situation. Use every element you can to your advantage, and get through the enemy forces.

Reach the helicopter.
Don't let them see you, hear you, smell you.
And remember: never farter. You can do it.

Made by:
Fran Romguer
Gonzalo de Santos
Jesús Bartús
Petru Neacsu
Maikel Ortega
